Name: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator
About the game: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator Remastered is a refreshed version of the game from 2017. You play the role of a boy who found himself in the wrong place at the wrong time. In order to prevent the danger of nudists, he has to get out of the beach as soon as possible and cause its absolute destruction. Embark on an incredible journey and face the mighty nudists to protect themselves from the power of their pixel genitals. The Remastered version has been enhanced with new features such as: Full controller support Steam Cloud support New achievements 5 new gameplay modes Arcade mode The original 2017 version is still available.
